channel.title: Need some help makin homemade acids
channel.description: what is an easy way to make an acid at home using substances such as lemon juice and vinigar? im doin a second part of my lab for sci fair. this is very important so pls post even if you dont have a clue. any materials or whatever tips u can give me. ty

item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown

“what is the ph of an onion” lol

what is the ph of blood? 7.3 to 7.4
What is the ph of your fist and my face? I think its slightly acidic.
what is the ph of DEATH
[/quote]
You’re a hardcunt[/quote]

I know right.

item.source: Need some help makin homemade acids

item.title: Need some help makin homemade acids
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

io9:

Okay, you need some baking soda. Add the lemon juice to it, pour in some water, then add a LOT of vinegar. Let it settle at room temperature for a couple of days. After that, add ~3cups of 91% Isopropyl alcohol, stir well, and let evaporate over a stove. When you are finished, you should have LSD crystals.

Although that was mildly amusing, just for the record, it’s extremely difficult to synthesize LSD and you would need a full lab to do it properly.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Dreadfully sorry for swearing.
Most of this information, if not a lot more, could have been found with some google searches.
Do people underestimate google these days, or what?

http://www.google.com.au/search?hl=en&sa=X&oi=spell&resnum=1&ct=result&cd=1&q=make+homemade+acids

http://www.google.com.au/search?hl=en&q=homemade+LSD&btnG=Search&meta=

It’s just all about keywords and then a little bit of clicking and reading.
“homemade acids ingredients LSD”

Things like that, whatever. /sigh.

item.title: Need some help makin homemade acids
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

mike121333:

what is the ph of an onion?

Onions, pickled 3.70 - 4.60 Onions, red 5.30 - 5.80 Onion white 5.37 - 5.85 Onions, yellow 5.32 - 5.60

How fucking hard is it to google?
http://www.google.com.au/search?hl=en&q=ph+onion&btnG=Google+Search&meta=
http://www.cfsan.fda.gov/~comm/lacf-phs.html
